sentence.Network_en: I shall have words with these stupid friends of mine!
sentence.Network_cn: 我真应该跟我这些愚蠢的朋友理论理论！

sentence.Network_en: I shall be 26 years old on Friday next.
Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我实在告诉你们，你们中间有一个人要卖我了。

双方应（shall）谘商及竭力获致满意解决。第12.5条为：缔约国确认如适当将（may）提供本条相关事项之公众参与（public participati…
...使用,应当,shall,表明这是一个义务性的列举,但协议本身并没有说明其列举是否是封闭性,closed,的,很多学者认为.
谁有剑桥英语二级词汇表_百度知道 ... seventh adj 第7 shall v 将要 shark n 鲨鱼.

list.abs: 人教版初二下册英语单词_百度文库 ... won't =will not 将不 3 I'll =I shall 我将... 21 4 everything pron. 每件事,一切 5.
we will always be friends ; I shall treasure it always ; I will always love you ., 我们会永远是朋友 ; 我会永远珍惜 ; 我会永远爱你.

the angel told Joseph : " [ Mary ] will bring forth a Son and you shall call His name Jesus , for He will save His people from their sins " ( Matt . 1 : 21 ) .正如天使对约瑟所说：「（马利亚)将要生一个儿子，你要给他起名叫耶稣，因他要将自己的百姓从罪恶里救出来」（马太福音1章21节)。
the building construction enterprise shall repair the quality flaws discovered., 对已发现的质量缺陷 , 建筑施工企业应当修复.
without licensing , no entity or individual shall engage in the food production and trading activities ., 未经许可 , 任何单位或者个人不得从事食品生产经营活动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sceal, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zal and German soll, from a base meaning 'owe'

entry.tran: (用在疑问句中，与I和we连用表示提出或征求意见)
entry.def: You use shall with 'I' and 'we' in questions in order to make offers or suggestions, or to ask for advice.

example.ex: I bought some lovely raisin buns at the bakery. Shall I bring you one with some tea?...
example.tran: 我在面包店里买了些很好吃的葡萄干圆面包，要不要我给你拿一个，再来点儿茶？

entry.tran: (通常与 I 和 we 连用)将要，将会
entry.def: You use shall, usually with 'I' and 'we', when you are referring to something that you intend to do, or when you are referring to something that you are sure will happen to you in the future.

example.ex: We shall be landing in Paris in sixteen minutes, exactly on time...
example.tran: 我们将于 16 分钟后准时在巴黎降落。

example.ex: I shall sail out on the twenty-second...

entry.tran: (与I和we连用，在演讲或文章中用于引出将要讨论或解释的内容)后面要，下文会
entry.def: You use shall with 'I' or 'we' during a speech or piece of writing to say what you are going to discuss or explain later.

example.ex: In Chapter 3, I shall describe some of the documentation that I gathered...
example.tran: 在第三章，我会介绍我收集到的一些文献记录。

example.ex: We shall refer here to three significant trends that arose in the previous decade...
example.tran: 这里我们将提及过去 10 年中出现的 3 个显著趋势。

entry.tran: (通常指按照规则或法律规定)必须，一定，将
entry.def: You use shall to indicate that something must happen, usually because of a rule or law. You use shall not to indicate that something must not happen.

example.ex: The president shall hold office for five years...
The Security Council shall decide what measures shall be taken to restore peace and security...
example.tran: 安理会将决定采取何种措施来恢复和平与安全。

entry.tran: (通常与 you 连用)可以，能够
entry.def: You use shall, usually with 'you', when you are telling someone that they will be able to do or have something they want.

example.ex: Very well, if you want to go, go you shall...
example.tran: 好吧，如果你想走，就走吧。

example.ex: 'I want to hear all the gossip, all the scandal.' — 'You shall, dearie, you shall!'
example.tran: “把所有的八卦，所有的丑闻都告诉我吧。”——“好的，亲爱的，好的。”

entry.tran: (用于 look forward to 和 hope 之类的动词前表示语气的委婉)
entry.def: You use shall with verbs such as 'look forward to' and 'hope' to say politely that you are looking forward to something or hoping to do something.

example.ex: Well, we shall look forward to seeing him tomorrow...
example.tran: 嗯，我们期待着明天与他会面。

example.ex: I shall hope to see you in my office, young lady, and we'll review your portfolio.
example.tran: 希望你能到我办公室来，小姐，我们将审查一下你的资料。

entry.tran: (表示可能的结果或后果)应该，就会
entry.def: You use shall when you are referring to the likely result or consequence of a particular action or situation.

example.ex: When big City firms cut down on their entertainments, we shall know that times really are hard...
example.tran: 当伦敦商业区的大公司削减他们的娱乐活动开支，我们就知道世道真的变得艰难了。

example.ex: This is our last chance and we shall need to take it if we are to compete and survive.
example.tran: 这是我们最后的机会，如果我们想要竞争并存活下来的话，就一定要抓住这次机会。

auth_sentence.content: We shall see the progress made in the summer.
auth_sentence.res_content: We shall see the progress made in the summer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We shall see the progress made in the summer.

auth_sentence.content: What shall we do with all this vodka then?
auth_sentence.res_content: What shall we do with all this vodka then?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What shall we do with all this vodka then?

auth_sentence.content: If I do I shall collide with my keyboard.
auth_sentence.res_content: If I do I shall collide with my keyboard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If I do I shall collide with my keyboard.

Sentence.sentence: So what shall we work on today?
Let's take a coffee break, shall we?

means.word_mean: (有时与I和we连用, 表示一般将来时)将要, 会

sentences.en: I shall go to London next month.
We shan't know the results of the test until tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们明天才能知道考试结果。

means.word_mean: (尤用于与I和we连用的要求听者作决定的问句中)…好吗?要不要…?

sentences.en: Shall we go to the theatre this evening?
Let's look at that book again, shall we?
sentences.cn: 我们再看一看那本书好吗?

means.word_mean: (尤用于正式文字中表示允诺、命令或法令)〈正〉可; 必须; 必将

sentences.en: Candidates shall remain in their seats until all the papers have been collected.
sentences.cn: 试卷全部收回后考生才可离开座位。

jushi.english: Let's look at that book again, shall we?
jushi.chinese: 我们再看一看哪本书好吗?

jushi.english: It shall be unlawful to carry firearms.
Shall we go to the theater this evening?
